input.sentences: we took this picture in the inn we were staying while on our trip .
we saw a few castles | but did n't tour any of them .
we went to a historical church with relics one day .
the inn had a really comfortable balcony ; sometimes i napped there .
the sunsets could not have been more beautiful .
output.sentences: I took a picture of our friends that were staying in the same hotel as us on our trip.
We took a tour with them and looked at the beautiful castes in the area.
There were many historical relics in the castles and we had a fun and interesting day.
After the sightseeing we were exhausted so we napped in the comfortable chairs at the inn.
Later we walked along the beach and city streets and admired the beautiful sunset.
